sub_title: Engineer od Biomedical electronics turned Ph.D. Neuroscientist, Working at EMPA Switzerland,Healthcare Innovator, Founder of 3EGA
summary: Biomedical engineer of electronics with a strong background in medical physics, electromagnetic stimulation, nonlinear analysis of electrophysiology signals, and complex systems dynamics (with a Magisterium in biophysics and Ph.D. in Neuroscience) with a business background. As an experienced researcher in cognitive neuroscience and neurology (20+ yrs of experience), I merged my understanding of electronics engineering, AI, and biophysics applied to neuroscientific innovations, like electromagnetic stimulation of the brain, early detection of neurological and psychiatric disorders (computational psychiatry) and modeling in human physiology. I am a curious and analytical mind connecting different fields of research, with an entrepreneurial experience interested in the translation of research innovation for digital tools and solutions in health. Currently, I am working on the further development and clinical validation of digital twins for transdermal fentanyl treatment including various forms of mass transfer in nonhomogeneous systems and understanding of omnipresent fractal features of human physiology. The interaction of biological tissue and electromagnetic fields is also an important interest, particularly in noninvasive therapeutics and interventions. I am also a start-up creator and scientific communicator (with years of lecturing experience), multidisciplinary-oriented, highly driven, and passionate about bringing change in clinical diagnostics and treatment.

treasury_media.title: Milena ČUKIĆ | PostDoc Position | PostDoc research associate | Complutense University of Madrid, Madrid | UCM | Instituto de Tecnologia del Conocimiento

profile_positions.description:
-Experienced Researcher and Lecturer in Biomedical science, Neuroscience and Electronics
-Engineer of biomedical electronics, measurement, and control (MS in ENG), Data analyist
-Magister of General Physiology with Biophysics and Ph.D. in Neuroscience
-Expert in nonlinear analysis of electrophysiological data and applications of Dynamical --Systems Theory (Chaos), as well as in Data mining
-Start-up creator and scientific developer, multidisciplinary study oriented, passionate about bringing change in clinical diagnostic(mental disorders and movement disorders) with nonlinear biomarkers
-International experience in scientific cooperation, project management, and development
